entry.title: giovannifdipasquale/weather_fetch: weather_fetch is a lightweight React application that allows users to retrieve real-time weather data for any city worldwide. The app integrates with the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch accurate weather details, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, cloud coverage, and sunrise/sunset times
entry.content: weather_fetch is a lightweight React application that allows users to retrieve real-time weather data for any city worldwide. The app integrates with the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch accurate weather details, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, cloud coverage, and sunrise/sunset times

entry.title: RohitM-IN/SQLParser: sqlparser-devexpress is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL 'WHERE' clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.
entry.content: sqlparser-devexpress is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL 'WHERE' clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.

entry.title: mankarshubham81/super-chat: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.
entry.content: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.
